title: TVS Mobility forms JV with Mitsubishi Corp for comprehensive vehicle mobility ecosystem in India
description: TVS Mobility and Mitsubishi Corporation have formed a joint venture to establish a comprehensive vehicle mobility ecosystem in India. Mitsubishi will initially invest Rs 300 crore, and both parties aim to support the growth of the joint venture. The collaboration will transform TVS Mobility's dealership business into TVS Vehicle Mobility Solution (TVS VMS), offering a complete portfolio of services to customers.
